title: nf-core/eager pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample_id.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

library_id.errorMessage: Library name must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

lane.errorMessage: Unrecognised lane number, must be an integer. If no lane information, specify 0.

colour_chemistry.errorMessage: Specified sequencing colour chemistry not recognised, must be '2' for Illumina NextSeq/NovaSeq or '4' for Illumina MiSeq/HiSeq/BGI.

pairment.errorMessage: Specified sequencing pairment not recognised, must be 'single' or 'paired'. BAM files containing merged reads files should be specified as 'single'.

strandedness.errorMessage: Specified library strandedness not recognised, must be 'single' or 'double'.

damage_treatment.errorMessage: Specified damage treatment not recognised, must be 'none', 'half' or 'full'.

r1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'.

r2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'.

bam.errorMessage: File supplied to bam column has unrecognised extension, must be '.bam'.

bam_reference_id.errorMessage: A BAM reference ID (corresponding to what is supplied to `--fasta`) must always be provided when providing a BAM file.
